subtitles:
50913 54208 People once believed
that when someone dies...

54290 57794 A crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

58712 62090 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

62174 64676 That a terrible sadness
is carried with it...
64760 66553 And the soul can't rest.
67554 70474 Then sometimes- just sometimes-

70557 74978 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
98335 100087 I got one here!

129992 134538 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

134620 138208 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

142462 145382 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.
145465 147718 All right, guys, let's do it.

147800 151054 Devil's-fuckin'-night.
What's the count so far?
152556 154349 They're slacking off from last year.

154433 157227 Three hours to go.
Maybe they're just slow starters.
157310 158895 Corning through!

163275 166612 I really empathize, but you guys just can't
come in here and take her away like this.
166695 168155 There are procedures to stick by.

168238 170824 You guys should have
cleared this with me first.

171325 173744 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia earhart.

173827 175579 We found her, detective,
and you missed it.

175662 179458 I don't care what her name is.
I didn't give the order to move her.

179540 182169 Jesus, Albrecht. I can see
why they took away your gold shield.

182252 184338 I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
186840 188133 All right, clear outta here.

189468 191762 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

194264 197225 - Where's Eric?
-Just don't worry about him.
199478 201563 Tell him to take care of Sarah.

201647 204858 Look, I will.
You just lie back. Come on.

215202 217537 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.
217620 221583 Look, your sister- she's gonna be okay.

221667 226004 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
226088 227506 She's my friend.
227589 229591 Her and Eric.
231968 233762 You lied to her about Eric.
236264 238266 And you're lying to me about Shelly.
239768 241687 She's gonna die, isn't she?
250696 252823 Now, come on. Come on.
253573 255200 Come on. It's okay.
258578 260080 She's gonna be fine.

278932 282853 A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

283562 285772 I used to think that was true
about everything-
285856 289776 families, friends, feelings.

290527 294281 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

294364 298785 Two people who are meant to be together-
nothing can keep them apart.
337073 338992 What are you, like, the night watchman?

361598 367062 You know, what this place needs
is a good natural catastrophe.
367145 370524 Earthquake, tornado, you know.
370607 371858 No, no, no, no. Mickey.

371942 374903 Come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
374986 377280 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
377364 379324 Hey, let me do it.

380492 384538 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

386039 387874 Don't cheap out on me.
Lots of onions.
387958 389042 Here you go.
389125 391503 There you go. All right.
391586 393088 Now we're talkin'.
394297 397300 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.
398844 400512 How do you steer that on a wet street?
400595 402681 Pure talent. Hi.

402764 406685 Sarah, she's a genuine “hot dogger.”
you hungry?

406768 408562 - You buyin'?
- I'm buyin'.
408645 410814 No onions though, okay?
412440 414025 They make you fart big time.

421950 424619 You know, lake erie
actually caught on fire once...

424703 427414 From all the crap
floating around in it.
428582 430333 I wish I could have seen that.

537732 540151 - We busted their machines!
- Boom!

563090 566511 Oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car. Cop car.
574352 576354 Bad people out on the street tonight.

582360 584988 - Damn it!
- What was that?

585070 586072 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
587073 588825 Mickey, call it in for me!
686214 687382 Department of housing!
687465 689551 Code violations?
689634 692011 Safety hazards?
692095 694264 Place looks fine to me.
694347 696307 Let's redecorate.

and felt how awful goodness is...
706650 710071 Saw virtue in her shape how lovely.”
710155 711239 lt's pornography.

781392 784270 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?
785605 787315 Look at that. Look at that.

788690 793196 Here's to devil's night,
my new favorite holiday.
793279 794781 To devil's night.
796783 798785 You go over there and tell your pals-
800160 801955 you sick fuck.

802956 805750 You're out of your
motherfuckin' mind, man.
811965 813341 Look at that!
814968 816636 Pussies drink last, man.
818470 820473 Fuck you, tin tin.

wants to bet me this one isn't?
834904 838825 Hey! Fire it up! Fire it up!
846416 848209 Here's your shooters.
848293 850044 Put your guns away, huh, guys?
850128 851838 How ya doin', pussycat?
887707 888958 Say that again.

902680 904098 Wow, you look great.

912940 915526 - Come here!
- No, no, no!
1013540 1016169 Couple more rings. That's 24k.
1018337 1020256 It's crap. It's probably fake.
1020339 1022675 Leather purse. Leather.

a bloodstain that's on here?

1032018 1034604 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.
1034687 1037523 Now, you take it or leave it.
1038649 1040359 Right there for ya.
1041903 1044447 Decisions, decisions. Yes, right.
1046365 1049535 You cheap-ass, chrome-dome...
1049619 1053581 Child-molestin', saprophyte motherfucker.
1053664 1055041 Close the gate when you go out!
1055124 1057752 I closes up for you real good, massa.
1061714 1063883 Yeah, sit on it and twirl, you dirty scum.
1068596 1071182 Lucky I don't stab your fat ass.

1178080 1180499 What the fuck
you all painted up for, crackhead, huh?
1185670 1187840 Halloween ain't till manana.
1218496 1221082 I'll kill you! You better go!
1230716 1232843 Fuck you, murderer!

1233552 1236389 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!
1236472 1237932 What the fuck you want, man?
1238015 1240476 I want you to tell me a story.

1240559 1242770 A man and a woman
in aloft a year ago.

1243896 1246524 - You're out of your fucking mind.
- Listen!
1246607 1248818 L'm sure you'll remember.
1248900 1251570 You killed them on Halloween.

1251654 1253656 Yeah. Yeah, right.
Halloween, yeah.

1253739 1256325 Some dude, some bitch.
Whatever, man.
1256409 1258244 Her name was Shelly.
1259036 1261997 You cut her. You raped her.

1263207 1267086 I shanked her pink ass,
and she loved it!
1277179 1279265 Murderer? Murderer?

1279348 1282059 Let me tell you about murder.
It's fun!
1284019 1286772 You gonna learn all about it.
1291610 1294071 I'd like you to meet two buddies of mine.
1295948 1297783 We never miss.
1306834 1309044 Try harder. Try again!
1316010 1318929 Victims. Aren't we all?
1330858 1336197 Sometimes it rains inside my head
1336280 1340743 when the words run dry
1340826 1344038 the walls are breathing

1344120 1347082 look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
1347166 1348459 Yeah, it's a mess.
1353630 1355716 No, they don't have to take you

1355800 1358594 I gotta go upstairs.
Report from the front.
1358677 1363224 No, they don't have to take you away
1363307 1366644 get out of my way, you worms!
1368187 1369688 Give me some of that over there!

1371940 1375444 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.
1375528 1377279 Hey, guess what.
1377363 1380449 Arcade games fell down, went boom.
1381742 1384370 Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1385246 1389416 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1389500 1392753 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.
1422825 1424243 You're thinking about the past.
1429498 1431375 Dad gave me this.
1431458 1433460 Fifth birthday.

1435880 1439550 He said. “childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.”
1454273 1455774 ls she asleep?
1463115 1464867 I think we broke her.
1470289 1473876 I love her eyes. Pretty.
1478172 1482801 No, they don't have to take you away
1490309 1493145 hey, kid, get the hell outta the road!
1511330 1512665 Don't fuck with me.
1516168 1518379 I told you to stay out of here.

1518462 1521966 Sol guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1524050 1526053 Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1526136 1527513 I don't have any dolls.
1530557 1531892 Get some food, huh?

1531976 1535020 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1540609 1543612 “Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.”
1554373 1557626 thirty, forty dollars.
1559378 1561797 Who the fuck is this now?
1561880 1566051 Hey! Piss off! We're closed!

1568846 1572725 Go sleep it off somewhere else, dust-head,
unless you want to get mutilated.
1577563 1579815 L'm gonna blow this guy's dick off.

1580774 1583777 Goddamn creatures of the night.
They never learn.

1593078 1598125 “Suddenly I heard a tapping,
as if someone gently rapping...
1598208 1600586 Rapping at my chamber door.”
1602629 1604923 what are you talking about?
1605007 1607634 You heard me rapping, right?

1607718 1611889 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1614266 1617269 L'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1618604 1621106 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.
1625444 1629198 Oh, shit. Oh, shit on me!
1630574 1633118 Shit on me. Shit on me!
1640209 1642503 Mr. Gideon. You're not paying attention.
1650552 1654473 I repeat. A gold engagement ring, yes?

1655933 1659436 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named tin tin.

1663357 1665692 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1671073 1672908 Who's this sack of shit?

1672990 1676120 That's tin tin,
one of t-bird's little helpers.
1676203 1679248 I think you can rule out accidental death.

1679330 1682126 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1682209 1686380 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1686463 1691176 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.
1691260 1693178 L'm supposed to thank you for that, right?
1693262 1697015 Word to the wise. Watch your fuckin' mouth.
1698225 1700644 What the hell do you call that?
1702646 1704273 I call it blood, detective.
1704356 1708110 I suppose you'll write it up as graffiti.

1708193 1710988 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1719079 1720622 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1720706 1723375 - Don't you know this game?
- What game are you talkin' about?
1724293 1726295 Okay, I'll tell you about the rings!

1726378 1729381 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!
1731466 1733385 Take 'em! Take your fucking rings!

1734636 1736388 And you can choke on them,
you son of a bitch!

1739975 1742561 - Look, it goes up to the attic.
- Okay.
1761330 1763624 It's beautiful. I don't believe it.

1787522 1790442 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1790525 1791944 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1794905 1799243 Now you're gonna tell me where to find
the rest of tin tin's little party pals.
1799326 1800953 The pit. They all hang out at the pit.

1801036 1803497 All of t-bird's little potato-heads
hang out there.
1803580 1806875 Funboy- he lives there upstairs, all right?

1811797 1814383 - A whole jolly club-
- stop! Please!
1814466 1816635 With jolly pirate nicknames!

1816718 1819346 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!

1821056 1827020 Each one of these is a life-
a life you helped destroy.
1827104 1829690 L'm begging you. Don't kill me.
1831483 1833610 L'm not gonna kill you.

1833694 1837698 Your job will be to tell the rest of them
that death is coming for them-
1846415 1849167 Tell them Eric Draven sends his regards.

1852504 1856633 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1856717 1858385 You're nothing but street grease!
You hear that?
1858468 1860846 Street grease, you motherfucker!
1860929 1862472 Is that gasoline I smell?

1884703 1887539 It's on the house, kiddo.
You know that.
1888248 1890542 One root beer.
1892710 1895255 I can't do anything.
1895339 1899801 Your mom, technically, she's off right now.
1906640 1908685 Police! Don't move!
1908769 1910896 I said, “don't move!”
1912730 1914608 I thought the police always said “freeze!”

1914690 1917027 lam the police
and I say don't move, snow white.
1917110 1918612 You move, you're dead.
1920238 1923909 And I say I'm dead and I move.
1924785 1927245 Not one more step. I'm serious.
1927329 1931666 Then shoot, if you will, officer Albrecht.

1931750 1934878 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1936755 1939966 - You don't remember me?

Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1944096 1946807 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1946890 1950352 I want you to move over to the curb.

1954523 1956191 We're gonna wait here for backup.
1956274 1958276 It's gettin' too friggin' weird for me.
1959694 1960862 Oh, it gets better.

played with knives.
1966827 1968036 Like the coat?

1968120 1971373 - You're the guy that murdered tin tin.

1972833 1974292 He was already dead.

1975252 1977963 He died a year ago-
the moment he touched her.

1980465 1983468 They're all dead.

1984803 1985971 Get away from there!
1986054 1988723 Cops! Get outta here!
1990475 1992477 Leave it! Leave it! Run!
1998024 2001111 Oh, great. Great.

2005198 2007576 And you lose him
right out in the open.

2007659 2012539 Well, at least he didn't do that
“walking against the wind” shit.

2012622 2014916 - I hate that.
- Little early for devil's night.
2016000 2017335 What the hell is going on there?
2018920 2021756 You are very restless.

2021840 2024926 Just wish I was a little hungry again.
That's all.
2025010 2026678 Be careful of what you ask for.
2026760 2028638 Yeah, you may get it. I know.
2040650 2043737 There are energies aligning against you.
2043820 2046281 Seeing is believing, isn't it?

2065467 2069346 Gideon's pawn shop just burned down
to the foundation.
2069429 2071890 Nobody cleared this little event with me.
2071973 2074559 I didn't have nothing to do with that.

2074643 2077270 - L'm sure you must be awful disappointed.

2077354 2080690 One of my crew got himself perished.

2080774 2083068 - Who might that be?
- Tin tin.

2083150 2087697 Somebody stuck his blades in all
his major organs in alphabetical order.

2087780 2091117 Gentlemen, I think we ought to have

2091200 2093620 For poor old tin tin.

tomorrow night, right?

2101795 2103880 That's very reassuring.

2103964 2107551 I still ain't heard the story
on why Gideon's burned down.

2108760 2113265 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of god or something?
2114099 2115976 Call it my need to know.
2147924 2150093 Hey! Let me go, you creep!

2156516 2159811 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2162272 2164608 - He couldn't have stopped.
- He was a butt-face.
2164690 2166318 I could have made it.

2168236 2170322 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?
2175327 2177454 It's more like surfing than skating.
2177537 2179998 I wish the rain would stop,just once.
2181166 2182626 It can't rain all the time.

2201645 2206232 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?
2206316 2208777 Double homicide a year ago.
2208860 2210695 No convictions.
2210779 2214199 Annie, look at that.

2215200 2219537 “We, the undersigned tenants
of 1929 caulderon court apartments”-
2219620 2221122 what is this, a petition?

2221206 2223541 A big “kick me” sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.
2223625 2225126 The cause got her killed.

2225210 2227712 She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2227796 2233677 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2233760 2237305 The last time you snooping on a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2237389 2241393 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2249359 2252112 You're gonna wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2254406 2258535 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2260203 2261705 I owe you one.
2291484 2295196 Tomorrow night we can get high...

2295280 2298908 And watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.
2324434 2326644 There's a big fuckin' bird over there.

2333985 2337572 Come here, bird.
Hey, bird. Hey, bird.
2340074 2342660 Here, birdie, birdie.
2342744 2345705 Come here, birdie, birdie, birdie.
2356549 2358510 What the fuck?

2364933 2369354 Man, don't do that!
You nearly gave me a fucking heart attack!
2369437 2371689 Look at the guy.
2371773 2373358 Don't sweat it.

2376319 2379364 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2388248 2392085 Take your shot, funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2394128 2399050 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2399133 2402679 You need professional help.
2407016 2409727 He shoots! He scores!
2419863 2422532 Jesus Christ!

2422615 2426369 Jesus Christ?
Stop me if you heard this one.
2426452 2428705 Jesus Christ walks into a hotel.

2434794 2437589 He hands the innkeeper
three nails, and he asks-
2438798 2441175 don't you ever fuckin' die?
2441259 2443094 “Can you put me up for the night?”

2449017 2453605 - does that hurt?
- Fuck, yes, it fuckin' hurts!
2456524 2459903 Look what you've done to my sheets.
2484135 2486137 L've got a gun in my pocket.
2488973 2491851 You're happy to see me, aren't you?
2509660 2513498 Stay away! Stay away from me!

2525176 2529722 “Mother” is the name for god
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2529806 2534560 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2546197 2549784 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2581816 2585570 If l wanted ice, I would have asked for ice!
Now fill it up!
2587989 2590033 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2590116 2591784 I really need this.
2603296 2605298 You burn yourself playing with matches?

2605380 2607967 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2608050 2610511 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2610595 2613514 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?
2613598 2616434 Get my friend here a glass of blood.

2618227 2621439 - Hey, hon!
- Good night, Darla.
2625318 2628988 You stay put right there.
2638372 2640583 Get away, steam-head.

2673074 2676619 You can see I'm here on the corner
of 27th street and east Washington place...

2676702 2679997 The site of last year's
biggest devil's night conflagration.

2680080 2682250 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2682333 2685962 Across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2686045 2688673 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...
2688756 2690800 And cost the lives of two firefighters.

2691509 2695763 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police precinct-
2698474 2700893 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2707108 2708359 Good likeness.

2708442 2712155 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2713322 2714490 You still have your hat on.
2718369 2720496 I gotta sit down.
2730339 2734594 Are you some kind of... ghost?
2744228 2746147 I don't know what I am.
2746230 2748774 I need you to tell me what happened to us.

2750860 2754864 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2754947 2758034 She was beaten and raped.

2758117 2762705 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2762788 2765208 Come on. Read the file.

2765290 2769837 Shelly Webster held on for 30 hours
in intensive care.
2769920 2772965 Her body finally just gave it up.
2773049 2775927 I saw it. I couldn't do Jack for her.

2787480 2788898 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!
2801619 2804789 I saw her through your eyes.
2804872 2807041 You stayed with her the whole time.

2807124 2811295 Well, you gotta understand
something, all right?

2812630 2817385 I was hoping she'd come out of it,
you know...
2817468 2820388 Give me something I could work with.
2825268 2827770 why didn't you do something about it?

2827853 2831148 You think any of those people in that building-
even the ones who signed the petition-
2831232 2832984 would talk after what happened to you?
2834777 2836946 I kept asking questions...

2838155 2840783 And finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2844829 2846706 This your wife?

2846789 2851335 Yeah, we- well, not anymore.
We're getting a divorce.

2856132 2859844 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2859927 2862263 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.
2862346 2865641 Believe me, nothing is trivial.

2876319 2880906 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2885995 2888831 Are you gonna vanish
into thin air again?
2892877 2895171 I thought I'd use your front door.

2901260 2904055 I'm sorry as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

2916067 2918986 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2919070 2921822 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2921906 2924992 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2925076 2928079 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.
2928162 2930873 I saw him too. He had a guitar.

2930956 2935378 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.
2935460 2939131 He winked at ya? Musicians.
2940590 2942093 What else did you see?

2942176 2945096 So far I haven't heard shit about what
you're gonna do about all this crap!

2945179 2949975 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed away and went swirling.
2952269 2954021 You ain't lost everything.

2954105 2959235 Yeah? And maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Jesus!
2960110 2962905 Fair enough. Catch.

2966492 2968911 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.
2968994 2970830 Are you tellin' me this thing is real?

2970913 2974583 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2974667 2978754 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2978838 2982967 You're directly out of your fucking mind!
You know that?
2984969 2987888 Yeah. Eyes see.

2987972 2990933 It's one of the most important things
i learned from my sister.
2991016 2992643 Sister? She's supposed to be your sister?
2994353 2997690 My father's daughter. That's right.

2997773 2999483 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?
3001277 3003279 Now, let's take it from the top, friend.
3003362 3006782 With a lot of detail. What do you say?

3006866 3010411 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3010494 3013914 He told me to tell t-bird
that death was on its way.
3013998 3016208 Whatever the fuck that means.
3017126 3020045 Draven. He said his name was Eric Draven.
3021130 3023215 You wanna relax that thing now?

3023299 3027970 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

3028053 3032266 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
3032349 3035144 I ain't makin' all this up.
3035227 3038397 I ain't twisted like you two fucks.
3048240 3049867 A boy and his bird.
3051410 3053370 Awful touching.

3063630 3066592 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.
3075935 3078229 Funboy said he saw a black bird too.

3080773 3083108 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.
3084777 3087530 L'll have thejanitor come on up.
3152094 3156307 You again. Are you lost or hungry?
3161520 3163439 It can't rain all the time
3163522 3165524 can't rain all the time

3177160 3179872 I mean, how many times I gotta tell you?
We're in this together, or we ain't!
3179955 3181957 If one part falls, it all falls!
